channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 10:46 threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 10:46 threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 10:06 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 10:06 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#of Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
